1163950.name: A Dragon's Tale VR
1163950.description:
'A Dragon's Tale VR' is a unique adventure game set on a fantasy volcanic island.
You play as a dragon and can fly around the large tropical landscape using your arms as wings.

As the game is in virtual reality, full immersion is a key part of the experience. We want you to feel like a force of nature, to rain destruction on the landscape around you as you see fit. Many wondrous and bizarre creatures have been designed, both friendly and dangerous, each with their own unique personalities and behaviours.

• Realistic Flying
• Large island map
• Immersive controls
• Minimal HUD
• Fire-Breathing

Three Exciting Minigames

Time Trials
Put your aerial skills to the test in an exhilarating time trial tour of the island.
Find a balance between flapping to gain height and gliding to gain speed. Try to beat your
friends’ times, and earn your title as the fastest dragon.

Cow Drop
Become an apex predator and master your accuracy and strength as you hunt unsuspecting cows in the most challenging of our minigames.
You only have three minutes to find, catch, and carry as many cows as you can, then cast them to their doom in the volcano above.

Burning Spree
Unleash your destructive side in this minigame by using your fire-breath to ignite trees and animals with reckless abandon.
Cover as much ground as possible and set as much alight as you can.
